page.title: 03Dores/Abriachan_Nessie(2)
page.content: {James Skeldon,8,Torr Gardens,Dores "The first sighting was on 12th August 1969. .It was at a layby three miles from {Dores}.I saw both the neck and the hump.It was the grey colour of an elephant.{Nessie}was half a mile away, too far for my camera.I recall that water was cascading down from its back, like a small waterfall." {Ronald MacLennan of MacLennan,The Old {Mill,Dores.} "The last time I saw {Nessie} was in September 1983.The monster was about 150 metres from the shore in front of our window.It looked like a large submarine,black with additions,like wheel tyres,the monster was about 40 - 45 feet long.The monster stayed in sight for about 2 minutes."
